channel.title: Npc's wander? randomwalk? How?
channel.description:
[s]Well i wanted this on quite a few Npc's, as pretty much all of them on RS wander around a small area, anyone help with it?[/s]
[u][b]Solved by RiiON.[/b][/u] [quote="Rii0N"]In autospawn.cfg theres x y range for npcs to walk.
0 0 0 0
the 4 0's are the range i usually set mine to 5 or sometimes 10
Edit: In dungeons etc have them low numbers cos the NPC's tend to noclip all over the place. lol.[/quote]
Thx :D

item.title: Npc's wander? randomwalk? How?

Topic was solved, why post back just to flame?

item.title: Npc's wander? randomwalk? How?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“noobie22, post:5, topic:274510”][quote author=silabgarza link=topic=362680.msg2755962#msg2755962 date=1240187964]
howd u get 122 rep…

watever u set them to the coords u want them walking in

the 1st 2 are set to the X and Y of the northeast corner of the max u want them walking in
(make a box)

and the 2nd set of 0’s are southwest corner coords
[/quote]

Rep means nothing.

How’d you get 125 rep with that Grammar?[/quote]People repped him, silly.

Read full topic
